app1.appName: Turbo Vid Player: Play FREE Music & Videos
app1.shortDescription: Turbo Vid player is a free music and video player for you to enjoy listening to music and watching videos on your phone !

app2.appName: Google Go: A lighter, faster way to search
app2.shortDescription: Google Go is a lighter, faster way to search, with search results optimised to save up to 40% data.
